articles.description: India’s fearsome pace attack ruthlessly blows away Ireland on a difficult pitch in New York as they start the T20 World Cup with an eight-wicket victory.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Rohit Sharma leads India to victory over Ireland

articles.description: Russian teenager Mirra Andreeva claims the biggest win of her career against an out-of-sorts Aryna Sabalenka to reach the semi-finals of the French Open.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Russian teenager Mirra Andreeva beats out-of-sorts Aryna Sabaelenka

articles.description: Wolves are unlikely to find enough support from other Premier League clubs to scrap the use of VAR.
articles.title: Premier League: Wolves set to lose bid to scrap VAR

articles.description: Manchester City chairman Khaldoon al-Mubarak says the "constant referencing" of the 115 charges against the club are "frustrating".
articles.title: Man City: Premier League charges 'frustrating', says Khaldoon al-Mubarak

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is back to spearhead Portugal's bid to become European champions again - in potentially his last major tournament.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Portugal's Euros record breaker and record chaser

articles.description: England bowler Mark Wood says Saturday's meeting with Australia is "huge" after their  washout against Scotland on Tuesday.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Mark Wood says England v Australia 'huge' for defending champions

articles.description: Former Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur manager Antonio Conte has been appointed the new boss of Napoli on a three-year deal.
articles.title: Antonio Conte: Napoli appoint former Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur manager

articles.description: Pittsburgh Steelers sign Cameron Sutton following his release by the Detroit Lions following domestic abuse allegations.
articles.title: Cameron Sutton rejoins Pittsburgh Steelers after Detroit Lions release over police hunt

articles.description: Jonny Evans, 36, is in talks over signing a new deal at Manchester United.
articles.title: Manchester United: Jonny Evans and Omari Forson in talks over new deals

articles.description: Kenya's 10km road race world record holder Rhonex Kipruto is banned for six years over irregularities in his Athlete Biological Passport.
articles.title: Rhonex Kipruto: Kenyan world record holder banned for six years over Athlete Biological Passport irregularities
